body_html:
I think, I know where the problem is but don't know how to fix it.
If you run:

gdb python
(gdb) run tf.py

where tf.py has

import tensorflow as tf

the trace tells that segfault is happening at:
PyArray_API () from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/multiarray.so

So its probably some issue with numpy.

body:
I think, I know where the problem is but don't know how to fix it. 
If you run:

```
gdb python
(gdb) run tf.py 
```

where tf.py has

``` python
import tensorflow as tf
```

the trace tells that segfault is happening at:  
PyArray_API () from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/multiarray.so

So its probably some issue with numpy.
